parameters.name: CreatorId
parameters.description: The ID of the group creator. The ID can be up to 64 bytes in length and can contain letters and digits.

parameters.name: DataCenter
parameters.description: The data center. It must be the same as the data center that was specified when you called the [CreateLiveMessageApp](~~2593195~~) operation to create the interactive messaging application. Valid values: cn-shanghai and ap-southeast-1 (Singapore).

parameters.name: GroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the group that you want to create. The group ID must be unique within your business. The ID can be up to 64 bytes in length and can contain letters and digits.

parameters.name: GroupInfo
parameters.description: The additional information about the group. The value can be up to 32 KB in length.

parameters.name: GroupName
parameters.description: The name of the group. The name can be up to 128 bytes in length.
